answerText: The Monster at the End of this Book[10] The Monster at the End of This Book stars this fuzzy blue Sesame Street Muppet who ineptly serves Mr. Johnson at Charlie's Restaurant and has a superhero alter-ego.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | J Sergeant Reynolds-Ohio State-St. Johns | 1 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question:  [10] Name this book in which the fearful protagonist insistently begs the reader not to turn the page before realizing that he himself is the title character.
